alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 9:56PM CDT until July 12 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pettis County in central Missouri... Southeastern Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 956 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Green Ridge, or near Whiteman Air Force Base, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Windsor, La Monte and Green Ridge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
